description: Vulnerability in the Oracle WebLogic Server product of Oracle Fusion Middleware (component: Core).  Supported versions that are affected are 12.2.1.4.0, 14.1.1.0.0 and  14.1.2.0.0. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with logon to the infrastructure where Oracle WebLogic Server executes to compromise Oracle WebLogic Server.  Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in  unauthorized update, insert or delete access to some of Oracle WebLogic Server accessible data. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 4.0 (Integrity impacts).  CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:L/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:N/I:L/A:N).
